name: First game (Akrotag)
description:
The goal of the game is to try to avoid the bomb that are rolling towards you.

There are to sliders on the HUD: one for the ammos and one for health

The binds are:

WASD to move;

left click to shoot;

V to change of cam (be careful the controls are mirrored on the backward cam)

I am looking forward for honest opinions on how to improve my skills.

I haven't made a main menu screen, I wanted to finish that project as fast as possible because I was starting to get bored of it.
